html: These verses further describe the beautification of "the city of the Lord, The Zion of the Holy One of Israel" (verse 14). Elder Orson Pratt said this will be a time of great abundance of precious metals, when "God will give the keys of the treasures of the earth and he will open them up to the people." After quoting verse 17, he continued, "Gold and silver will be so plentiful that they will be used for the pavement of streets" (JD, 18:154).
